configuration_files.script:
#!/bin/bash
source /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/cmsset_default.sh
export SCRAM_ARCH=slc6_amd64_gcc472
if [ -r CMSSW_5_3_19/src ] ; then 
 echo release CMSSW_5_3_19 already exists
else
scram p CMSSW CMSSW_5_3_19
fi
cd CMSSW_5_3_19/src
eval `scram runtime -sh`


scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py step1 --filein "dbs:/BBH_HToTauTau_M_125_TuneZ2star_8TeV_pythia6_tauola/Summer12-START53_V7C-v1/GEN-SIM" --fileout file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-02150_step1.root --pileup_input "dbs:/MinBias_TuneZ2star_8TeV-pythia6/Summer12-START50_V13-v3/GEN-SIM" --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --pileup 2012_Summer_50ns_PoissonOOTPU --datatier GEN-SIM-RAW --conditions START53_V19::All --step DIGI,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:7E33v2 --python_filename HIG-Summer12DR53X-02150_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 360 || exit $? ; 

cmsDriver.py step2 --filein file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-02150_step1.root --fileout file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-02150.root --mc --eventcontent AODSIM,DQM --datatier AODSIM,DQM --conditions START53_V19::All --step RAW2DIGI,L1Reco,RECO,VALIDATION:validation_prod,DQM:DQMOfflinePOGMC --python_filename HIG-Summer12DR53X-02150_2_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 360 || exit $? ;

#!/bin/bash
source /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/cmsset_default.sh
export SCRAM_ARCH=slc5_amd64_gcc462
if [ -r CMSSW_5_3_13/src ] ; then 
 echo release CMSSW_5_3_13 already exists
else
scram p CMSSW CMSSW_5_3_13
fi
cd CMSSW_5_3_13/src
eval `scram runtime -sh`

curl -s --insecure https://cms-pdmv.cern.ch/mcm/public/restapi/requests/get_fragment/HIG-Summer12-02276 --retry 2 --create-dirs -o Configuration/GenProduction/python/HIG-Summer12-02276-fragment.py 
[ -s Configuration/GenProduction/python/HIG-Summer12-02276-fragment.py ] || exit $?;

scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py Configuration/GenProduction/python/HIG-Summer12-02276-fragment.py --fileout file:HIG-Summer12-02276.root --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --datatier GEN-SIM --conditions START53_V7C::All --beamspot Realistic8TeVCollision --step GEN,SIM --python_filename HIG-Summer12-02276_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 112 || exit $? ;

#!/bin/bash
source /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/cmsset_default.sh
export SCRAM_ARCH=None
if [ -r CMSSW_5_3_11_patch2/src ] ; then 
 echo release CMSSW_5_3_11_patch2 already exists
else
scram p CMSSW CMSSW_5_3_11_patch2
fi
cd CMSSW_5_3_11_patch2/src
eval `scram runtime -sh`
curl  -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cms-sw/genproductions/V02-04-12/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_TuneZ2star_8TeV_generic_LHE_pythia_tauola_cff.py --retry 2 --create-dirs -o  Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_TuneZ2star_8TeV_generic_LHE_pythia_tauola_cff.py

scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_TuneZ2star_8TeV_generic_LHE_pythia_tauola_cff.py --filein lhe:9202  --fileout file:HIG-Summer12-01191.root --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --pileup NoPileUp --datatier GEN-SIM --conditions START53_V7C::All --beamspot Realistic8TeVCollision --step GEN,SIM --datamix NODATAMIXER --python_filename HIG-Summer12-01191_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 66 || exit $? ;
configuration_files.title: cmsDriver script

configuration_files.script:
import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *
from GeneratorInterface.ExternalDecays.TauolaSettings_cff import *

generator = cms.EDFilter("Pythia6HadronizerFilter",
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    ExternalDecays = cms.PSet(
        Tauola = cms.untracked.PSet(
            TauolaPolar,
            TauolaDefaultInputCards
        ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('Tauola')
    ),
    UseExternalGenerators = cms.untracked.bool(True),   
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock,
        processParameters = cms.vstring('MSEL=0          ! User defined processes',
                                        'PMAS(5,1)=4.8   ! b quark mass',
                                        'PMAS(6,1)=172.5 ! t quark mass'),
        # This is a vector of ParameterSet names to be read, in this order
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('pythiaUESettings',
                                    'processParameters'
                                    )
        )
)

configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
    version = cms.untracked.string('$Revision: 1.1 $'),
    name = cms.untracked.string ('$Source: /local/reps/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_TuneZ2star_8TeV_generic_LHE_pythia_tauola_cff.py,v $'),
    annotation = cms.untracked.string('runs Z2* Pythia6')
)

#!/bin/bash
source /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/cmsset_default.sh
export SCRAM_ARCH=slc5_amd64_gcc462
if [ -r CMSSW_5_3_17/src ] ; then 
 echo release CMSSW_5_3_17 already exists
else
scram p CMSSW CMSSW_5_3_17
fi
cd CMSSW_5_3_17/src
eval `scram runtime -sh`

curl -s --insecure https://cms-pdmv.cern.ch/mcm/public/restapi/requests/get_fragment/EGM-Summer12-00001 --retry 2 --create-dirs -o Configuration/GenProduction/python/EGM-Summer12-00001-fragment.py 
[ -s Configuration/GenProduction/python/EGM-Summer12-00001-fragment.py ] || exit $?;

scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py Configuration/GenProduction/python/EGM-Summer12-00001-fragment.py --fileout file:EGM-Summer12-00001.root --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --datatier GEN-SIM --conditions START53_V29B::All --beamspot Realistic8TeVCollision --step GEN,SIM --python_filename EGM-Summer12-00001_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 110 || exit $? ;
configuration_files.title: cmsDriver script

scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py step1 --filein "dbs:/DY1JetsToLL_M-10To50_TuneZ2Star_8TeV-madgraph/Summer12-START50_V13-v1/GEN-SIM" --fileout file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-01965_step1.root --pileup_input "dbs:/MinBias_TuneZ2star_8TeV-pythia6/Summer12-START50_V13-v3/GEN-SIM" --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --runsScenarioForMC Run2012_AB_C_D_oneRunPerEra --pileup fromDB --datatier GEN-SIM-RAW --conditions START53_V7N::All --step DIGI,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:7E33v2 --python_filename HIG-Summer12DR53X-01965_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 288 || exit $? ; 

cmsDriver.py step2 --filein file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-01965_step1.root --fileout file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-01965.root --mc --eventcontent AODSIM,DQM --datatier AODSIM,DQM --conditions START53_V7N::All --step RAW2DIGI,L1Reco,RECO,VALIDATION:validation_prod,DQM:DQMOfflinePOGMC --python_filename HIG-Summer12DR53X-01965_2_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 288 || exit $? ;

#!/bin/bash
source /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/cmsset_default.sh
export SCRAM_ARCH=None
if [ -r CMSSW_5_1_3/src ] ; then 
 echo release CMSSW_5_1_3 already exists
else
scram p CMSSW CMSSW_5_1_3
fi
cd CMSSW_5_1_3/src
eval `scram runtime -sh`
curl  -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cms-sw/genproductions/V02-00-72/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_MgmMatchTuneZ2star_8TeV_madgraph_tauola_cff.py --retry 2 --create-dirs -o  Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_MgmMatchTuneZ2star_8TeV_madgraph_tauola_cff.py 
[ -s Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_MgmMatchTuneZ2star_8TeV_madgraph_tauola_cff.py ] || exit $?;


scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_MgmMatchTuneZ2star_8TeV_madgraph_tauola_cff.py --filein lhe:5546  --fileout file:HIG-Summer12-00002.root --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --pileup NoPileUp --datatier GEN-SIM --conditions START50_V13::All --beamspot Realistic8TeVCollision --step GEN,SIM --datamix NODATAMIXER --python_filename HIG-Summer12-00002_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 137 || exit $? ;
configuration_files.title: cmsDriver script

configuration_files.script:
import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *
from GeneratorInterface.ExternalDecays.TauolaSettings_cff import *

generator = cms.EDFilter("Pythia6HadronizerFilter",
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    ExternalDecays = cms.PSet(
        Tauola = cms.untracked.PSet(
            TauolaPolar,
            TauolaDefaultInputCards
        ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('Tauola')
    ),
    UseExternalGenerators = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock,
        processParameters = cms.vstring('MSEL=0         ! User defined processes', 
                        'PMAS(5,1)=4.8   ! b quark mass',
                        'PMAS(6,1)=172.5 ! t quark mass',
			'MSTJ(1)=1       ! Fragmentation/hadronization on or off',
			'MSTP(61)=1      ! Parton showering on or off'),
        # This is a vector of ParameterSet names to be read, in this order
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('pythiaUESettings', 
            'processParameters')
    ),
    jetMatching = cms.untracked.PSet(
       scheme = cms.string("Madgraph"),
       mode = cms.string("auto"),	# soup, or "inclusive" / "exclusive"
       MEMAIN_nqmatch = cms.int32(5),
       MEMAIN_etaclmax = cms.double(-1),
       MEMAIN_qcut = cms.double(-1),
       MEMAIN_minjets = cms.int32(-1),
       MEMAIN_maxjets = cms.int32(-1),
       MEMAIN_showerkt = cms.double(0),   
       MEMAIN_excres = cms.string(""),
       outTree_flag = cms.int32(0)    
    )    
)

configuration_files.script:
import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *
from GeneratorInterface.ExternalDecays.TauolaSettings_cff import *

generator = cms.EDFilter("Pythia6HadronizerFilter",
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    ExternalDecays = cms.PSet(
        Tauola = cms.untracked.PSet(
            TauolaPolar,
            TauolaDefaultInputCards
        ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('Tauola')
    ),
    UseExternalGenerators = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock,
        processParameters = cms.vstring('MSEL=0         ! User defined processes', 
                        'PMAS(5,1)=4.8   ! b quark mass',
                        'PMAS(6,1)=172.5 ! t quark mass',
			'MSTJ(1)=1       ! Fragmentation/hadronization on or off',
			'MSTP(61)=1      ! Parton showering on or off'),
        # This is a vector of ParameterSet names to be read, in this order
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('pythiaUESettings', 
            'processParameters')
    ),
    jetMatching = cms.untracked.PSet(
       scheme = cms.string("Madgraph"),
       mode = cms.string("auto"),	# soup, or "inclusive" / "exclusive"
       MEMAIN_nqmatch = cms.int32(5),
       MEMAIN_etaclmax = cms.double(-1),
       MEMAIN_qcut = cms.double(-1),
       MEMAIN_minjets = cms.int32(-1),
       MEMAIN_maxjets = cms.int32(-1),
       MEMAIN_showerkt = cms.double(0),   
       MEMAIN_excres = cms.string(""),
       outTree_flag = cms.int32(0)    
    )    
)

    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    ExternalDecays = cms.PSet(
        Tauola = cms.untracked.PSet(
            TauolaPolar,
            TauolaDefaultInputCards
        ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('Tauola')
    ),
    UseExternalGenerators = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock,
        processParameters = cms.vstring('MSEL=0         ! User defined processes', 
                        'PMAS(5,1)=4.8   ! b quark mass',
                        'PMAS(6,1)=172.5 ! t quark mass',
			'MSTJ(1)=1       ! Fragmentation/hadronization on or off',

       MEMAIN_nqmatch = cms.int32(5),

)

configuration_files.script:
import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *

generator = cms.EDFilter("Pythia6HadronizerFilter",
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock,
        processParameters = cms.vstring('MSEL=0          ! User defined processes',
                                        'PMAS(5,1)=4.4   ! b quark mass',
                                        'PMAS(6,1)=172.4 ! t quark mass'),
        # This is a vector of ParameterSet names to be read, in this order
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('pythiaUESettings',
                                    'processParameters'
                                    )
        )
)

configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
    version = cms.untracked.string('$Revision: 1.1 $'),
    name = cms.untracked.string ('$Source: /cvs_server/repositories/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_TuneZ2star_8TeV_generic_LHE_pythia_cff.py,v $'),
    annotation = cms.untracked.string('runs Z2* Pythia6')
)

abstract.description:
Simulated dataset GluGluHToGG_M-125_8TeV-pythia6 in AODSIM format for 2012 collision data.

See the description of the simulated dataset names in: About CMS simulated dataset names.

These simulated datasets correspond to the collision data collected by the CMS experiment in 2012.

configuration_files.script:
#!/bin/bash
source /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/cmsset_default.sh
export SCRAM_ARCH=slc6_amd64_gcc472
if [ -r CMSSW_5_3_19/src ] ; then 
 echo release CMSSW_5_3_19 already exists
else
scram p CMSSW CMSSW_5_3_19
fi
cd CMSSW_5_3_19/src
eval `scram runtime -sh`


scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py step1 --filein "dbs:/GluGluHToGG_M-125_8TeV-pythia6/Summer12-START53_V7C_ext1-v1/GEN-SIM" --fileout file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-02133_step1.root --pileup_input "dbs:/MinBias_TuneZ2star_8TeV-pythia6/Summer12-START50_V13-v3/GEN-SIM" --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --runsScenarioForMC Run2012_AB_C_D_oneRunPerEra --pileup fromDB --datatier GEN-SIM-RAW --conditions START53_V7N::All --step DIGI,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:7E33v2 --python_filename HIG-Summer12DR53X-02133_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 288 || exit $? ; 

cmsDriver.py step2 --filein file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-02133_step1.root --fileout file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-02133.root --mc --eventcontent AODSIM,DQM --datatier AODSIM,DQM --conditions START53_V7N::All --step RAW2DIGI,L1Reco,RECO,VALIDATION:validation_prod,DQM:DQMOfflinePOGMC --python_filename HIG-Summer12DR53X-02133_2_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 288 || exit $? ;

#!/bin/bash
source /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/cmsset_default.sh
export SCRAM_ARCH=slc6_amd64_gcc472
if [ -r CMSSW_5_3_19/src ] ; then 
 echo release CMSSW_5_3_19 already exists
else
scram p CMSSW CMSSW_5_3_19
fi
cd CMSSW_5_3_19/src
eval `scram runtime -sh`
curl  -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cms-sw/genproductions/V02-00-75/python/EightTeV/PYTHIA6_ggH_2gamma_mH125_TuneZ2star_8TeV_cff.py --retry 2 --create-dirs -o  Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/PYTHIA6_ggH_2gamma_mH125_TuneZ2star_8TeV_cff.py 
[ -s Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/PYTHIA6_ggH_2gamma_mH125_TuneZ2star_8TeV_cff.py ] || exit $?;


scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/PYTHIA6_ggH_2gamma_mH125_TuneZ2star_8TeV_cff.py --fileout file:HIG-Summer12-02269.root --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --datatier GEN-SIM --conditions START53_V7C::All --beamspot Realistic8TeVCollision --step GEN,SIM --python_filename HIG-Summer12-02269_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 47 || exit $? ;
configuration_files.title: cmsDriver script

configuration_files.script:
import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *

source = cms.Source("EmptySource")
generator = cms.EDFilter('Pythia6GeneratorFilter',
	comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
	crossSection = cms.untracked.double(1.0),
	filterEfficiency = cms.untracked.double(1.0),
	maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
	pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(False),
	pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(0),

	PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
		pythiaUESettingsBlock,
		processParameters = cms.vstring('PMAS(25,1)=125.0        !mass of Higgs', 
            'MSEL=0                  ! user selection for process', 
            'MSUB(102)=1             !ggH', 
            'MSUB(123)=0             !ZZ fusion to H', 
            'MSUB(124)=0             !WW fusion to H', 
            'MDME(190,1) = 0            !W decay into dbar u', 
            'MDME(191,1) = 0            !W decay into dbar c', 
            'MDME(192,1) = 0            !W decay into dbar t', 
            'MDME(194,1) = 0            !W decay into sbar u', 
            'MDME(195,1) = 0            !W decay into sbar c', 
            'MDME(196,1) = 0            !W decay into sbar t', 
            'MDME(198,1) = 0            !W decay into bbar u', 
            'MDME(199,1) = 0            !W decay into bbar c', 
            'MDME(200,1) = 0            !W decay into bbar t', 
            'MDME(206,1) = 0            !W decay into e+ nu_e', 
            'MDME(207,1) = 0            !W decay into mu+ nu_mu', 
            'MDME(208,1) = 0            !W decay into tau+ nu_tau', 
            'MDME(210,1)=0           !Higgs decay into dd', 
            'MDME(211,1)=0           !Higgs decay into uu', 
            'MDME(212,1)=0           !Higgs decay into ss', 
            'MDME(213,1)=0           !Higgs decay into cc', 
            'MDME(214,1)=0           !Higgs decay into bb', 
            'MDME(215,1)=0           !Higgs decay into tt', 
            'MDME(216,1)=0           !Higgs decay into', 
            'MDME(217,1)=0           !Higgs decay into Higgs decay', 
            'MDME(218,1)=0           !Higgs decay into e nu e', 
            'MDME(219,1)=0           !Higgs decay into mu nu mu', 
            'MDME(220,1)=0           !Higgs decay into tau nu tau', 
            'MDME(221,1)=0           !Higgs decay into Higgs decay', 
            'MDME(222,1)=0           !Higgs decay into g g', 
            'MDME(223,1)=1           !Higgs decay into gam gam',
            'MDME(224,1)=0           !Higgs decay into gam Z', 
            'MDME(225,1)=0           !Higgs decay into Z Z', 
            'MDME(226,1)=0          !Higgs decay into W W'),
		parameterSets = cms.vstring(
			'pythiaUESettings',
			'processParameters',
		)
	)
)

configuration_files.script:
import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *
from GeneratorInterface.ExternalDecays.TauolaSettings_cff import *

generator = cms.EDFilter("Pythia6HadronizerFilter",
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    ExternalDecays = cms.PSet(
        Tauola = cms.untracked.PSet(
            TauolaPolar,
            TauolaDefaultInputCards
        ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('Tauola')
    ),
    UseExternalGenerators = cms.untracked.bool(True),   
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock,
        processParameters = cms.vstring('MSEL=0          ! User defined processes',
                                        'PMAS(5,1)=4.8   ! b quark mass',
                                        'PMAS(6,1)=172.5 ! t quark mass',
                                        'MSTP(86)=1      ! requires MPIs to be softer than the main interaction',
                                        ),
        # This is a vector of ParameterSet names to be read, in this order
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('pythiaUESettings',
                                    'processParameters'
                                    )
        )
)

configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
    version = cms.untracked.string('$Revision: 1.2 $'),
    name = cms.untracked.string ('$Source: /local/reps/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_TuneZ2star_8TeV_generic_LHE_pythia_tauola_cff.py,v $'),
    annotation = cms.untracked.string('runs Z2* Pythia6')
)

#!/bin/bash
source /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/cmsset_default.sh
export SCRAM_ARCH=slc5_amd64_gcc462
if [ -r CMSSW_5_3_14_patch2/src ] ; then 
 echo release CMSSW_5_3_14_patch2 already exists
else
scram p CMSSW CMSSW_5_3_14_patch2
fi
cd CMSSW_5_3_14_patch2/src
eval `scram runtime -sh`


scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py step1 --filein "dbs:/GluGluTo4mu_Contin_8TeV-MCFM67-pythia6/Summer12-START53_V7C-v1/GEN-SIM" --fileout file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-01788_step1.root --pileup_input "dbs:/MinBias_TuneZ2star_8TeV-pythia6/Summer12-START50_V13-v3/GEN-SIM" --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --pileup 2012_Summer_50ns_PoissonOOTPU --datatier GEN-SIM-RAW --conditions START53_V19::All --step DIGI,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:7E33v2 --python_filename HIG-Summer12DR53X-01788_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 360 || exit $? ; 

cmsDriver.py step2 --filein file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-01788_step1.root --fileout file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-01788.root --mc --eventcontent AODSIM,DQM --datatier AODSIM,DQM --conditions START53_V19::All --step RAW2DIGI,L1Reco,RECO,VALIDATION:validation_prod,DQM:DQMOfflinePOGMC --python_filename HIG-Summer12DR53X-01788_2_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 360 || exit $? ;

configuration_files.title: cmsDriver script

configuration_files.script:
import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *
from GeneratorInterface.ExternalDecays.TauolaSettings_cff import *

generator = cms.EDFilter("Pythia6HadronizerFilter",
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    ExternalDecays = cms.PSet(
        Tauola = cms.untracked.PSet(
            TauolaPolar,
            TauolaDefaultInputCards
        ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('Tauola')
    ),
    UseExternalGenerators = cms.untracked.bool(True),   
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock,
        processParameters = cms.vstring('MSEL=0          ! User defined processes',
                                        'PMAS(5,1)=4.8   ! b quark mass',
                                        'PMAS(6,1)=172.5 ! t quark mass',
                                        'MSTP(86)=1      ! requires MPIs to be softer than the main interaction',
                                        ),
        # This is a vector of ParameterSet names to be read, in this order
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('pythiaUESettings',
                                    'processParameters'
                                    )
        )
)

configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
    version = cms.untracked.string('$Revision: 1.2 $'),
    name = cms.untracked.string ('$Source: /local/reps/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_TuneZ2star_8TeV_generic_LHE_pythia_tauola_cff.py,v $'),
    annotation = cms.untracked.string('runs Z2* Pythia6')
)

#!/bin/bash
source /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/cmsset_default.sh
export SCRAM_ARCH=None
if [ -r CMSSW_5_3_11_patch2/src ] ; then 
 echo release CMSSW_5_3_11_patch2 already exists
else
scram p CMSSW CMSSW_5_3_11_patch2
fi
cd CMSSW_5_3_11_patch2/src
eval `scram runtime -sh`


scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py step1 --filein "dbs:/GluGluToHHTo2B2WToJJLNu_mH-125_8TeV-madgraph-pythia6-tauola/Summer12-START53_V7C-v1/GEN-SIM" --fileout file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-01408_step1.root --pileup_input "dbs:/MinBias_TuneZ2star_8TeV-pythia6/Summer12-START50_V13-v3/GEN-SIM" --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --pileup 2012_Summer_50ns_PoissonOOTPU --datatier GEN-SIM-RAW --conditions START53_V19::All --step DIGI,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:7E33v2 --python_filename HIG-Summer12DR53X-01408_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 360 || exit $? ; 

cmsDriver.py step2 --filein file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-01408_step1.root --fileout file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-01408.root --mc --eventcontent AODSIM,DQM --datatier AODSIM,DQM --conditions START53_V19::All --step RAW2DIGI,L1Reco,RECO,VALIDATION:validation_prod,DQM:DQMOfflinePOGMC --python_filename HIG-Summer12DR53X-01408_2_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 360 || exit $? ;

#!/bin/bash
source /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/cmsset_default.sh
export SCRAM_ARCH=None
if [ -r CMSSW_5_3_11_patch2/src ] ; then 
 echo release CMSSW_5_3_11_patch2 already exists
else
scram p CMSSW CMSSW_5_3_11_patch2
fi
cd CMSSW_5_3_11_patch2/src
eval `scram runtime -sh`
curl  -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cms-sw/genproductions/V02-05-09/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_TuneZ2star_8TeV_generic_LHE_pythia_tauola_cff.py --retry 2 --create-dirs -o  Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_TuneZ2star_8TeV_generic_LHE_pythia_tauola_cff.py 
[ -s Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_TuneZ2star_8TeV_generic_LHE_pythia_tauola_cff.py ] || exit $?;


scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_TuneZ2star_8TeV_generic_LHE_pythia_tauola_cff.py --filein lhe:9245  --fileout file:HIG-Summer12-01530.root --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --pileup NoPileUp --datatier GEN-SIM --conditions START53_V7C::All --beamspot Realistic8TeVCollision --step GEN,SIM --datamix NODATAMIXER --python_filename HIG-Summer12-01530_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 76 || exit $? ;
configuration_files.title: cmsDriver script

configuration_files.script:
import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *
from GeneratorInterface.ExternalDecays.TauolaSettings_cff import *

generator = cms.EDFilter("Pythia6HadronizerFilter",
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    ExternalDecays = cms.PSet(
        Tauola = cms.untracked.PSet(
            TauolaPolar,
            TauolaDefaultInputCards
        ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('Tauola')
    ),
    UseExternalGenerators = cms.untracked.bool(True),   
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock,
        processParameters = cms.vstring('MSEL=0          ! User defined processes',
                                        'PMAS(5,1)=4.8   ! b quark mass',
                                        'PMAS(6,1)=172.5 ! t quark mass'),
        # This is a vector of ParameterSet names to be read, in this order
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('pythiaUESettings',
                                    'processParameters'
                                    )
        )
)

configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
    version = cms.untracked.string('$Revision: 1.1 $'),
    name = cms.untracked.string ('$Source: /local/reps/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_TuneZ2star_8TeV_generic_LHE_pythia_tauola_cff.py,v $'),
    annotation = cms.untracked.string('runs Z2* Pythia6')
)

import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

# Z2 star tune with pT-ordered showers
from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *
from GeneratorInterface.ExternalDecays.TauolaSettings_cff import *

generator = cms.EDFilter(
    "Pythia6HadronizerFilter",
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    filterEfficiency = cms.untracked.double(1.0),
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(False),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    ExternalDecays = cms.PSet(
        Tauola = cms.untracked.PSet(
            TauolaPolar,
            TauolaDefaultInputCards
            ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('Tauola')
        ),
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock, 
        processParameters = cms.vstring(
            'MSEL=0           ! User defined processes', 
            'PMAS(5,1)=4.75   ! b quark mass', 
            'PMAS(6,1)=172.5  ! t quark mass',
            
            'MDME(210,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into dd',
            'MDME(211,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into uu',
            'MDME(212,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into ss',
            'MDME(213,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into cc',
            'MDME(214,1)=1    ! Higgs decay into bb',
            'MDME(215,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into tt',
            'MDME(216,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into bbbar prime',
            'MDME(217,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into ttbar prime',
            'MDME(218,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into e e',
            'MDME(219,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into mu mu',
            'MDME(220,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into tau tau',
            'MDME(221,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into tau tau prime',
            'MDME(222,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into g g',
            'MDME(223,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into gam gam',
            'MDME(224,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into gam Z',
            'MDME(225,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into Z Z',
            'MDME(226,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into W W'
            
            ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring(
            'pythiaUESettings', 
            'processParameters'
            )
        )
    )

configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
    version = cms.untracked.string('$Revision: 1.2 $'),
    name = cms.untracked.string('$Source: /local/reps/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/POWHEG_PYTHIA6_Tauola_H_bb_8TeV_cff.py,v $'),
    annotation = cms.untracked.string('POWHEG + PYTHIA6 + Tauola - Higgs -> bb  at 8TeV')
    )

configuration_files.script:
import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

# Z2star tune with pT-ordered showers
from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *
from GeneratorInterface.ExternalDecays.TauolaSettings_cff import *

generator = cms.EDFilter(
    "Pythia6HadronizerFilter",
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    filterEfficiency = cms.untracked.double(1.0),
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(False),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    ExternalDecays = cms.PSet(
        Tauola = cms.untracked.PSet(
            TauolaPolar,
            TauolaDefaultInputCards
            ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('Tauola')
        ),
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock, 
        processParameters = cms.vstring(
            'MSEL=0           ! User defined processes', 
            'PMAS(5,1)=4.75   ! b quark mass', 
            'PMAS(6,1)=172.5  ! t quark mass',
            
            'MDME(210,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into dd',
            'MDME(211,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into uu',
            'MDME(212,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into ss',
            'MDME(213,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into cc',
            'MDME(214,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into bb',
            'MDME(215,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into tt',
            'MDME(216,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into bbbar prime',
            'MDME(217,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into ttbar prime',
            'MDME(218,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into e e',
            'MDME(219,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into mu mu',
            'MDME(220,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into tau tau',
            'MDME(221,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into tau tau prime',
            'MDME(222,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into g g',
            'MDME(223,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into gam gam',
            'MDME(224,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into gam Z',
            'MDME(225,1)=1    ! Higgs decay into Z Z',
            'MDME(226,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into W W',
            
            'MDME(174,1)=0           !Z decay into d dbar', 
            'MDME(175,1)=0           !Z decay into u ubar', 
            'MDME(176,1)=0           !Z decay into s sbar', 
            'MDME(177,1)=0           !Z decay into c cbar', 
            'MDME(178,1)=0           !Z decay into b bbar', 
            'MDME(179,1)=0           !Z decay into t tbar', 
            'MDME(182,1)=0           !Z decay into e- e+', 
            'MDME(183,1)=1           !Z decay into nu_e nu_ebar', 
            'MDME(184,1)=0           !Z decay into mu- mu+', 
            'MDME(185,1)=1           !Z decay into nu_mu nu_mubar', 
            'MDME(186,1)=0           !Z decay into tau- tau+', 
            'MDME(187,1)=1           !Z decay into nu_tau nu_taubar',
            
            'CKIN(45)=1.             !low mass cut on Z1',
            'CKIN(47)=1.             !low mass cut on Z2'  
            ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring(
            'pythiaUESettings', 
            'processParameters'
            )
        )
    )

configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
    version = cms.untracked.string('$Revision: 1.2 $'),
    name = cms.untracked.string('$Source: /local/reps/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/POWHEG_PYTHIA6_Tauola_H_ZZ_2l2nu_8TeV_cff.py,v $'),
    annotation = cms.untracked.string('POWHEG + PYTHIA6 + Tauola - Higgs -> ZZ -> 2l2nu at 8TeV')
    )

import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

# Z2 star tune with pT-ordered showers
from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *
from GeneratorInterface.ExternalDecays.TauolaSettings_cff import *

generator = cms.EDFilter(
    "Pythia6HadronizerFilter",
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    filterEfficiency = cms.untracked.double(1.0),
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(False),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    ExternalDecays = cms.PSet(
        Tauola = cms.untracked.PSet(
            TauolaPolar,
            TauolaDefaultInputCards
            ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('Tauola')
        ),
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock, 
        processParameters = cms.vstring(
            'MSEL=0           ! User defined processes', 
            'PMAS(5,1)=4.75   ! b quark mass', 
            'PMAS(6,1)=172.5  ! t quark mass',
            
            'MDME(210,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into dd',
            'MDME(211,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into uu',
            'MDME(212,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into ss',
            'MDME(213,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into cc',
            'MDME(214,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into bb',
            'MDME(215,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into tt',
            'MDME(216,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into bbbar prime',
            'MDME(217,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into ttbar prime',
            'MDME(218,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into e e',
            'MDME(219,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into mu mu',
            'MDME(220,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into tau tau',
            'MDME(221,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into tau tau prime',
            'MDME(222,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into g g',
            'MDME(223,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into gam gam',
            'MDME(224,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into gam Z',
            'MDME(225,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into Z Z',
            'MDME(226,1)=1    ! Higgs decay into W W',
            
            'MDME(190,1)=4    ! W decay into dbar u',
            'MDME(191,1)=4    ! W decay into dbar c',
            'MDME(192,1)=4    ! W decay into dbar t',
            'MDME(194,1)=4    ! W decay into sbar u',
            'MDME(195,1)=4    ! W decay into sbar c',
            'MDME(196,1)=4    ! W decay into sbar t',
            'MDME(198,1)=4    ! W decay into bbar u',
            'MDME(199,1)=4    ! W decay into bbar c',
            'MDME(200,1)=4    ! W decay into bbar t',
            'MDME(206,1)=5    ! W decay into e+ nu_e',
            'MDME(207,1)=5    ! W decay into mu+ nu_mu',
            'MDME(208,1)=5    ! W decay into tau+ nu_tau'
            ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring(
            'pythiaUESettings', 
            'processParameters'
            )
        )
    )

configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
    version = cms.untracked.string('$Revision: 1.1 $'),
    name = cms.untracked.string('$Source: /cvs/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/POWHEG_PYTHIA6_Tauola_H_WW_lnujj_withTau_8TeV_cff.py,v $'),

export SCRAM_ARCH=slc5_amd64_gcc462
if [ -r CMSSW_5_3_14_patch2/src ] ; then 
 echo release CMSSW_5_3_14_patch2 already exists
else
scram p CMSSW CMSSW_5_3_14_patch2
fi
cd CMSSW_5_3_14_patch2/src
eval `scram runtime -sh`


scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py step1 --filein "dbs:/GluGluToHToZG_M-125_8TeV-powheg-pythia6/Summer12-START50_V13-v2/GEN-SIM" --fileout file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-01806_step1.root --pileup_input "dbs:/MinBias_TuneZ2star_8TeV-pythia6/Summer12-START50_V13-v3/GEN-SIM" --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --runsScenarioForMC Run2012_AB_C_D_oneRunPerEra --pileup fromDB --datatier GEN-SIM-RAW --conditions START53_V7N::All --step DIGI,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:7E33v2 --python_filename HIG-Summer12DR53X-01806_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 288 || exit $? ; 

cmsDriver.py step2 --filein file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-01806_step1.root --fileout file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-01806.root --mc --eventcontent AODSIM,DQM --datatier AODSIM,DQM --conditions START53_V7N::All --step RAW2DIGI,L1Reco,RECO,VALIDATION:validation_prod,DQM:DQMOfflinePOGMC --python_filename HIG-Summer12DR53X-01806_2_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 288 || exit $? ;

#!/bin/bash
source /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/cmsset_default.sh
export SCRAM_ARCH=None
if [ -r CMSSW_5_2_5/src ] ; then 
 echo release CMSSW_5_2_5 already exists
else
scram p CMSSW CMSSW_5_2_5
fi
cd CMSSW_5_2_5/src
eval `scram runtime -sh`
curl  -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cms-sw/genproductions/V02-01-21/python/EightTeV/POWHEG_PYTHIA6_Tauola_H_Zgamma_8TeV_cff.py --retry 2 --create-dirs -o  Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/POWHEG_PYTHIA6_Tauola_H_Zgamma_8TeV_cff.py 
[ -s Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/POWHEG_PYTHIA6_Tauola_H_Zgamma_8TeV_cff.py ] || exit $?;


scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/POWHEG_PYTHIA6_Tauola_H_Zgamma_8TeV_cff.py --filein lhe:5727  --fileout file:HIG-Summer12-00294.root --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --pileup NoPileUp --datatier GEN-SIM --conditions START52_V9::All --beamspot Realistic8TeVCollision --step GEN,SIM --datamix NODATAMIXER --python_filename HIG-Summer12-00294_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 94 || exit $? ;

configuration_files.script:
import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

# Z2star tune with pT-ordered showers
from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *
from GeneratorInterface.ExternalDecays.TauolaSettings_cff import *

generator = cms.EDFilter(
    "Pythia6HadronizerFilter",
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    filterEfficiency = cms.untracked.double(1.0),
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(False),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    ExternalDecays = cms.PSet(
        Tauola = cms.untracked.PSet(
            TauolaPolar,
            TauolaDefaultInputCards
            ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('Tauola')
        ),
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock, 
        processParameters = cms.vstring(
            'MSEL=0           ! User defined processes', 
            'PMAS(5,1)=4.75   ! b quark mass', 
            'PMAS(6,1)=172.5  ! t quark mass',
            
            'MDME(210,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into dd',
            'MDME(211,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into uu',
            'MDME(212,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into ss',
            'MDME(213,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into cc',
            'MDME(214,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into bb',
            'MDME(215,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into tt',
            'MDME(216,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into bbbar prime',
            'MDME(217,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into ttbar prime',
            'MDME(218,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into e e',
            'MDME(219,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into mu mu',
            'MDME(220,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into tau tau',
            'MDME(221,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into tau tau prime',
            'MDME(222,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into g g',
            'MDME(223,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into gam gam',
            'MDME(224,1)=1    ! Higgs decay into gam Z',
            'MDME(225,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into Z Z',
            'MDME(226,1)=0    ! Higgs decay into W W',

            'MDME(174,1)=0           !Z decay into d dbar',
            'MDME(175,1)=0           !Z decay into u ubar',
            'MDME(176,1)=0           !Z decay into s sbar',
            'MDME(177,1)=0           !Z decay into c cbar',
            'MDME(178,1)=0           !Z decay into b bbar',
            'MDME(179,1)=0           !Z decay into t tbar',
            'MDME(182,1)=1           !Z decay into e- e+',
            'MDME(183,1)=0           !Z decay into nu_e nu_ebar',
            'MDME(184,1)=1           !Z decay into mu- mu+',
            'MDME(185,1)=0           !Z decay into nu_mu nu_mubar',
            'MDME(186,1)=1           !Z decay into tau- tau+',
            'MDME(187,1)=0           !Z decay into nu_tau nu_taubar'

            ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring(
            'pythiaUESettings', 
            'processParameters'
            )
        )
    )

configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
    version = cms.untracked.string('$Revision: 1.2 $'),
    name = cms.untracked.string('$Source: /cvs/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/POWHEG_PYTHIA6_Tauola_H_Zgamma_8TeV_cff.py,v $'),
    annotation = cms.untracked.string('POWHEG + PYTHIA6 + Tauola - Higgs -> Zgamma at 8TeV')
    )

configuration_files.script:
#!/bin/bash
source /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/cmsset_default.sh
export SCRAM_ARCH=slc5_amd64_gcc462
if [ -r CMSSW_5_3_17/src ] ; then 
 echo release CMSSW_5_3_17 already exists
else
scram p CMSSW CMSSW_5_3_17
fi
cd CMSSW_5_3_17/src
eval `scram runtime -sh`


scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py step1 --filein "dbs:/GluGluToWWTo2L2Nu_1xHWidthContinInterf_M-125_mWW-0to140_8TeV_gg2vv315-pythia6/Summer12-START53_V7C-v1/GEN-SIM" --fileout file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-02023_step1.root --pileup_input "dbs:/MinBias_TuneZ2star_8TeV-pythia6/Summer12-START50_V13-v3/GEN-SIM" --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --pileup 2012_Summer_50ns_PoissonOOTPU --datatier GEN-SIM-RAW --conditions START53_V19::All --step DIGI,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:7E33v2 --python_filename HIG-Summer12DR53X-02023_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 360 || exit $? ; 

cmsDriver.py step2 --filein file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-02023_step1.root --fileout file:HIG-Summer12DR53X-02023.root --mc --eventcontent AODSIM,DQM --datatier AODSIM,DQM --conditions START53_V19::All --step RAW2DIGI,L1Reco,RECO,VALIDATION:validation_prod,DQM:DQMOfflinePOGMC --python_filename HIG-Summer12DR53X-02023_2_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 360 || exit $? ;

#!/bin/bash
source /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/cmsset_default.sh
export SCRAM_ARCH=slc5_amd64_gcc462
if [ -r CMSSW_5_3_17/src ] ; then 
 echo release CMSSW_5_3_17 already exists
else
scram p CMSSW CMSSW_5_3_17
fi
cd CMSSW_5_3_17/src
eval `scram runtime -sh`

curl -s --insecure https://cms-pdmv.cern.ch/mcm/public/restapi/requests/get_fragment/HIG-Summer12-02162 --retry 2 --create-dirs -o Configuration/GenProduction/python/HIG-Summer12-02162-fragment.py 
[ -s Configuration/GenProduction/python/HIG-Summer12-02162-fragment.py ] || exit $?;

scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py Configuration/GenProduction/python/HIG-Summer12-02162-fragment.py --filein "dbs:/GluGluToWWTo2L2Nu_1xHWidthContinInterf_M-125_mWW-0to140_8TeV_gg2vv315-pythia6/Summer12-START53_V7C-v1/GEN" --fileout file:HIG-Summer12-02162.root --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --datatier GEN-SIM --conditions START53_V7C::All --beamspot Realistic8TeVCollision --step GEN,SIM --python_filename HIG-Summer12-02162_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 76 || exit $? ;
configuration_files.title: cmsDriver script

configuration_files.title: cmsDriver script

configuration_files.script:
import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *
from GeneratorInterface.ExternalDecays.TauolaSettings_cff import *

generator = cms.EDFilter("Pythia6HadronizerFilter",
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    ExternalDecays = cms.PSet(
        Tauola = cms.untracked.PSet(
            TauolaPolar,
            TauolaDefaultInputCards
        ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('Tauola')
    ),
    UseExternalGenerators = cms.untracked.bool(True),   
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock,
        processParameters = cms.vstring('MSEL=0          ! User defined processes',
                                        'PMAS(5,1)=4.8   ! b quark mass',
                                        'PMAS(6,1)=172.5 ! t quark mass',
                                        'MSTP(86)=1      ! requires MPIs to be softer than the main interaction',
                                        ),
        # This is a vector of ParameterSet names to be read, in this order
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('pythiaUESettings',
                                    'processParameters'
                                    )
        )
)

configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
    version = cms.untracked.string('$Revision: 1.2 $'),
    name = cms.untracked.string ('$Source: /local/reps/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_TuneZ2star_8TeV_generic_LHE_pythia_tauola_cff.py,v $'),
    annotation = cms.untracked.string('runs Z2* Pythia6')
)

configuration_files.script:
import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *


generator = cms.EDFilter('Pythia6GeneratorFilter',
	comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
	crossSection = cms.untracked.double(1.080068e+02),
	filterEfficiency = cms.untracked.double(1),
	maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
	pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(False),
	pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(0),

	PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
		pythiaUESettingsBlock,
		processParameters = cms.vstring(
			'MSEL = 10       ! Photon+Jets production',
			'CKIN(3) = 120   ! minimum pt hat for hard interactions',
			'CKIN(4) = 170   ! maximum pt hat for hard interactions',
		),
		parameterSets = cms.vstring(
			'pythiaUESettings',
			'processParameters',
		)
	)

configuration_files.script:
#!/bin/bash
source /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/cmsset_default.sh
export SCRAM_ARCH=slc5_amd64_gcc462
if [ -r CMSSW_5_3_14/src ] ; then 
 echo release CMSSW_5_3_14 already exists
else
scram p CMSSW CMSSW_5_3_14
fi
cd CMSSW_5_3_14/src
eval `scram runtime -sh`


scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py step1 --filein "dbs:/G_Pt-30to50_TuneZ2star_8TeV_pythia6/Summer12-START50_V13-v3/GEN-SIM" --fileout file:JME-Summer12DR53X-00169_step1.root --pileup_input "dbs:/MinBias_TuneZ2star_8TeV-pythia6/Summer12-START50_V13-v3/GEN-SIM" --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --runsScenarioForMC Run2012_AB_C_D_oneRunPerEra --pileup fromDB --datatier GEN-SIM-RAW --conditions START53_V7N::All --step DIGI,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:7E33v2 --python_filename JME-Summer12DR53X-00169_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 288 || exit $? ; 

cmsDriver.py step2 --filein file:JME-Summer12DR53X-00169_step1.root --fileout file:JME-Summer12DR53X-00169.root --mc --eventcontent AODSIM,DQM --datatier AODSIM,DQM --conditions START53_V7N::All --step RAW2DIGI,L1Reco,RECO,VALIDATION:validation_prod,DQM:DQMOfflinePOGMC --python_filename JME-Summer12DR53X-00169_2_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 288 || exit $? ;

configuration_files.script:
import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *


generator = cms.EDFilter('Pythia6GeneratorFilter',
	comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
	crossSection = cms.untracked.double(1.993162e+04),
	filterEfficiency = cms.untracked.double(1),
	maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
	pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(False),
	pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(0),

	PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
		pythiaUESettingsBlock,
		processParameters = cms.vstring(
			'MSEL = 10       ! Photon+Jets production',
			'CKIN(3) = 30    ! minimum pt hat for hard interactions',
			'CKIN(4) = 50    ! maximum pt hat for hard interactions',
		),
		parameterSets = cms.vstring(
			'pythiaUESettings',
			'processParameters',
		)
	)
)

configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
	version = cms.untracked.string('\$Revision: 1.1 $'),
	name = cms.untracked.string('\$Source: /cvs_server/repositories/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/G_Pt_30to50_TuneZ2star_8TeV_pythia6_cff.py,v $'),
	annotation = cms.untracked.string('Summer2012-Z2star sample with PYTHIA6: Prompt photon production, pThat = 30 .. 50 GeV, TuneZ2star')
)

import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *


generator = cms.EDFilter('Pythia6GeneratorFilter',
	comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
	crossSection = cms.untracked.double(5.582865e+02),
	filterEfficiency = cms.untracked.double(1),
	maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
	pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(False),
	pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(0),

	PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
		pythiaUESettingsBlock,
		processParameters = cms.vstring(
			'MSEL = 10       ! Photon+Jets production',
			'CKIN(3) = 80    ! minimum pt hat for hard interactions',
			'CKIN(4) = 120   ! maximum pt hat for hard interactions',
		),
		parameterSets = cms.vstring(
			'pythiaUESettings',
			'processParameters',
		)
	)
)

configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
	version = cms.untracked.string('\$Revision: 1.1 $'),
	name = cms.untracked.string('\$Source: /cvs_server/repositories/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/G_Pt_80to120_TuneZ2star_8TeV_pythia6_cff.py,v $'),
	annotation = cms.untracked.string('Summer2012-Z2star sample with PYTHIA6: Prompt photon production, pThat = 80 .. 120 GeV, TuneZ2star')
)

import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *

generator = cms.EDFilter("Pythia6HadronizerFilter",
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock,
        processParameters = cms.vstring('MSEL=0         ! User defined processes', 
                        'PMAS(5,1)=4.8   ! b quark mass',
                        'PMAS(6,1)=172.5 ! t quark mass',
			'MSTJ(1)=1       ! Fragmentation/hadronization on or off',
			'MSTP(61)=1      ! Parton showering on or off'),
        # This is a vector of ParameterSet names to be read, in this order
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('pythiaUESettings', 
            'processParameters')
    ),
    jetMatching = cms.untracked.PSet(
       scheme = cms.string("Madgraph"),
       mode = cms.string("auto"),	# soup, or "inclusive" / "exclusive"
       MEMAIN_nqmatch = cms.int32(-1),
       MEMAIN_etaclmax = cms.double(-1),
       MEMAIN_qcut = cms.double(15),
       MEMAIN_minjets = cms.int32(-1),
       MEMAIN_maxjets = cms.int32(-1),
       MEMAIN_showerkt = cms.double(0),   
       MEMAIN_excres = cms.string(""),
       outTree_flag = cms.int32(0)    
    )    
)

source /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/cmsset_default.sh
export SCRAM_ARCH=slc5_amd64_gcc462
if [ -r CMSSW_5_3_14/src ] ; then 
 echo release CMSSW_5_3_14 already exists
else
scram p CMSSW CMSSW_5_3_14
fi
cd CMSSW_5_3_14/src
eval `scram runtime -sh`


scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py step1 --filein "dbs:/Neutrino_Pt_2to20_gun/Summer12-START50_V13-v3/GEN-SIM" --fileout file:JME-Summer12DR53X-00168_step1.root --pileup_input "dbs:/MinBias_TuneZ2star_8TeV-pythia6/Summer12-START50_V13-v3/GEN-SIM" --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --runsScenarioForMC Run2012_AB_C_D_oneRunPerEra --pileup fromDB --datatier GEN-SIM-RAW --conditions START53_V7N::All --step DIGI,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:7E33v2 --python_filename JME-Summer12DR53X-00168_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 288 || exit $? ;

configuration_files.script:
import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *
from GeneratorInterface.ExternalDecays.TauolaSettings_cff import *

generator = cms.EDFilter("Pythia6HadronizerFilter",
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    ExternalDecays = cms.PSet(
        Tauola = cms.untracked.PSet(
            TauolaPolar,
            TauolaDefaultInputCards
        ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('Tauola')
    ),
    UseExternalGenerators = cms.untracked.bool(True),   
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock,
        processParameters = cms.vstring('MSEL=0          ! User defined processes',
                                        'PMAS(5,1)=4.8   ! b quark mass',
                                        'PMAS(6,1)=172.5 ! t quark mass'),
        # This is a vector of ParameterSet names to be read, in this order
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('pythiaUESettings',
                                    'processParameters'
                                    )
        )
)

configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
    version = cms.untracked.string('$Revision: 1.1 $'),
    name = cms.untracked.string ('$Source: /local/reps/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_TuneZ2star_8TeV_generic_LHE_pythia_tauola_cff.py,v $'),
    annotation = cms.untracked.string('runs Z2* Pythia6')
)

import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *


generator = cms.EDFilter('Pythia6GeneratorFilter',
	comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
	crossSection = cms.untracked.double(2.998160e+10),
	filterEfficiency = cms.untracked.double(1),
	maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
	pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(False),
	pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(0),

	PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
		pythiaUESettingsBlock,
		processParameters = cms.vstring(
			'MSEL = 1        ! QCD hight pT processes',
			'CKIN(3) = 15    ! minimum pt hat for hard interactions',
			'CKIN(4) = 3000  ! maximum pt hat for hard interactions',
			'MSTP(142) = 2   ! Turns on the PYWEVT Pt reweighting routine',
		),
		CSAParameters = cms.vstring(
			'CSAMODE = 7     ! towards a flat QCD spectrum',
			'PTPOWER = 4.5   ! reweighting of the pt spectrum',
		),
		parameterSets = cms.vstring(
			'pythiaUESettings',
			'processParameters',
			'CSAParameters',
		)
	)
)

configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
	version = cms.untracked.string('\$Revision: 1.1 $'),
	name = cms.untracked.string('\$Source: /cvs_server/repositories/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/QCD_Pt_15to3000_TuneZ2star_Flat_8TeV_pythia6_cff.py,v $'),
	annotation = cms.untracked.string('Summer2012-Z2star sample with PYTHIA6: QCD dijet production, pThat = 15 .. 3000 GeV, weighted, TuneZ2star')
)

configuration_files.script:
import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

source = cms.Source("EmptySource")

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *
generator = cms.EDFilter("Pythia6GeneratorFilter",
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(False),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    filterEfficiency = cms.untracked.double(0.148),
    crossSection = cms.untracked.double(3.100e4),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),  # center of mass energy in GeV
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock,
        processParameters = cms.vstring('MSEL=1               ! QCD high pT processes',

    crossSection = cms.untracked.double(4.25e3),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),  # center of mass energy in GeV
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock,
        processParameters = cms.vstring('MSEL=1               ! QCD high pT processes',
                                        'CKIN(3)=250.          ! minimum pt hat for hard interactions',
                                        'CKIN(4)=350.          ! maximum pt hat for hard interactions'
                                        ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('pythiaUESettings', 
                                    'processParameters')
        )
)

genParticlesForFilter = cms.EDProducer("GenParticleProducer",
    saveBarCodes = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    src = cms.InputTag("generator"),
    abortOnUnknownPDGCode = cms.untracked.bool(True)
)

bctoefilter = cms.EDFilter("BCToEFilter",
                           filterAlgoPSet = cms.PSet(eTThreshold = cms.double(10),
                                                     genParSource = cms.InputTag("genParticlesForFilter")
                                                     )
                           )

emenrichingfilter = cms.EDFilter("EMEnrichingFilter",
                                 filterAlgoPSet = cms.PSet(isoGenParETMin=cms.double(20.),
                                                           isoGenParConeSize=cms.double(0.1),
                                                           clusterThreshold=cms.double(20.),
                                                           isoConeSize=cms.double(0.2),
                                                           hOverEMax=cms.double(0.5),
                                                           tkIsoMax=cms.double(5.),
                                                           caloIsoMax=cms.double(10.),
                                                           requireTrackMatch=cms.bool(False),
                                                           genParSource = cms.InputTag("genParticlesForFilter")
                                                           )
                                 )
    


# enter below the configuration metadata (only a description is needed, the rest is filled in by cvs)
configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
    version = cms.untracked.string('$Revision: 1.1 $'),
    name = cms.untracked.string('$Source: /cvs_server/repositories/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/QCD_Pt_250_350_EMEnriched_TuneZ2star_8TeV_pythia6_cff.py,v $'),

configuration_files.script:
#!/bin/bash
source /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/cmsset_default.sh
export SCRAM_ARCH=slc5_amd64_gcc462
if [ -r CMSSW_5_3_14/src ] ; then 
 echo release CMSSW_5_3_14 already exists
else
scram p CMSSW CMSSW_5_3_14
fi
cd CMSSW_5_3_14/src
eval `scram runtime -sh`


scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py step1 --filein "dbs:/QCD_Pt_80_170_EMEnriched_TuneZ2star_8TeV_pythia6/Summer12-START50_V13-v3/GEN-SIM" --fileout file:EWK-Summer12DR53X-00155_step1.root --pileup_input "dbs:/MinBias_TuneZ2star_8TeV-pythia6/Summer12-START50_V13-v3/GEN-SIM" --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --runsScenarioForMC Run2012_AB_C_D_oneRunPerEra --pileup fromDB --datatier GEN-SIM-RAW --conditions START53_V7N::All --step DIGI,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:7E33v2 --python_filename EWK-Summer12DR53X-00155_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 288 || exit $? ; 

cmsDriver.py step2 --filein file:EWK-Summer12DR53X-00155_step1.root --fileout file:EWK-Summer12DR53X-00155.root --mc --eventcontent AODSIM,DQM --datatier AODSIM,DQM --conditions START53_V7N::All --step RAW2DIGI,L1Reco,RECO,VALIDATION:validation_prod,DQM:DQMOfflinePOGMC --python_filename EWK-Summer12DR53X-00155_2_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 288 || exit $? ;

#!/bin/bash
source /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/cmsset_default.sh
export SCRAM_ARCH=None
if [ -r CMSSW_5_0_0_patch2/src ] ; then 
 echo release CMSSW_5_0_0_patch2 already exists
else
scram p CMSSW CMSSW_5_0_0_patch2
fi
cd CMSSW_5_0_0_patch2/src
eval `scram runtime -sh`
curl  -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cms-sw/genproductions/V02-00-24/python/EightTeV/QCD_Pt_80_170_EMEnriched_TuneZ2star_8TeV_pythia6_cff.py --retry 2 --create-dirs -o  Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/QCD_Pt_80_170_EMEnriched_TuneZ2star_8TeV_pythia6_cff.py 
[ -s Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/QCD_Pt_80_170_EMEnriched_TuneZ2star_8TeV_pythia6_cff.py ] || exit $?;


scram b
cd ../../
cmsDriver.py Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/QCD_Pt_80_170_EMEnriched_TuneZ2star_8TeV_pythia6_cff.py --fileout file:EWK-Summer12-00045.root --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --pileup NoPileUp --datatier GEN-SIM --conditions START50_V13::All --beamspot Realistic8TeVCollision --step GEN,SIM --datamix NODATAMIXER --python_filename EWK-Summer12-00045_1_cfg.py --no_exec --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/Utils.addMonitoring -n 96 || exit $? ;
configuration_files.title: cmsDriver script

configuration_files.script:
import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

source = cms.Source("EmptySource")

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *
generator = cms.EDFilter("Pythia6GeneratorFilter",
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(False),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    filterEfficiency = cms.untracked.double(0.154),
    crossSection = cms.untracked.double(1193000.),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),  # center of mass energy in GeV
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock,
        processParameters = cms.vstring('MSEL=1               ! QCD high pT processes',
                                        'CKIN(3)=80.          ! minimum pt hat for hard interactions',
                                        'CKIN(4)=170.          ! maximum pt hat for hard interactions'
                                        ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('pythiaUESettings', 
                                    'processParameters')
        )
)

genParticlesForFilter = cms.EDProducer("GenParticleProducer",
    saveBarCodes = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    src = cms.InputTag("generator"),
    abortOnUnknownPDGCode = cms.untracked.bool(True)
)

bctoefilter = cms.EDFilter("BCToEFilter",
                           filterAlgoPSet = cms.PSet(eTThreshold = cms.double(10),
                                                     genParSource = cms.InputTag("genParticlesForFilter")
                                                     )
                           )

emenrichingfilter = cms.EDFilter("EMEnrichingFilter",
                                 filterAlgoPSet = cms.PSet(isoGenParETMin=cms.double(20.),
                                                           isoGenParConeSize=cms.double(0.1),
                                                           clusterThreshold=cms.double(20.),
                                                           isoConeSize=cms.double(0.2),
                                                           hOverEMax=cms.double(0.5),
                                                           tkIsoMax=cms.double(5.),
                                                           caloIsoMax=cms.double(10.),
                                                           requireTrackMatch=cms.bool(False),
                                                           genParSource = cms.InputTag("genParticlesForFilter")
                                                           )
                                 )
    


# enter below the configuration metadata (only a description is needed, the rest is filled in by cvs)
configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
    version = cms.untracked.string('$Revision: 1.1 $'),
    name = cms.untracked.string('$Source: /cvs_server/repositories/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/Attic/QCD_Pt_80_170_EMEnriched_TuneZ2star_8TeV_pythia6_cff.py,v $'),
    annotation = cms.untracked.string('em-enriching filtered QCD pthat 80-170, 8 TeV')
)

# add your filters to this sequence
ProductionFilterSequence = cms.Sequence(generator * (genParticlesForFilter + ~bctoefilter + emenrichingfilter))

)

generator = cms.EDFilter("Herwig6HadronizerFilter",

        parameterSets = cms.vstring('herwigParams', 'herwigAUET2settings'),
        herwigParams  = cms.vstring(
            'RMASS(5) = 4.8       ! Set b mass.',
            'RMASS(6) = 172.5     ! Set top mass.',
            'SOFTME   = 0         ! Do not use soft matrix-element corrections.',

            'MODPDF(1)  = 10042      ! PDF set according to LHAGLUE',
            'MODPDF(2)  = 10042      ! CTEQ6L1',
            'ISPAC      = 2',
            'QSPAC      = 2.5',
            'PTRMS      = 1.2',
            'PTJIM      = 4.550      ! 3.224 * (runArgs.ecmEnergy/1800.)**0.231 @ 8 TeV',
            'JMRAD(73)  = 2.386      ! inverse proton radius squared',
            'PRSOF      = 0.0        ! prob. of a soft underlying event',
            'MAXER      = 1000000    ! max error'
        )
    ),

    herwigHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(False),

    emulatePythiaStatusCodes = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    lhapdfSetPath = cms.untracked.string(''),
    printCards = cms.untracked.bool(False),

)

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *
from GeneratorInterface.ExternalDecays.TauolaSettings_cff import *

generator = cms.EDFilter("Herwig6HadronizerFilter",
        comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
        doMPInteraction = cms.bool(False),
        emulatePythiaStatusCodes = cms.untracked.bool(True),
        filterEfficiency = cms.untracked.double(1.0),
        herwigHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(False),
        herwigVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(0),
        lhapdfSetPath = cms.untracked.string(''),
        maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(3),
        printCards = cms.untracked.bool(False),
        useJimmy = cms.bool(False),
        doMatching = cms.untracked.bool(False),
        nMatch = cms.untracked.int32(0),
        inclusiveMatching = cms.untracked.bool(True),
        matchingScale = cms.untracked.double(0.0), 
        ExternalDecays = cms.PSet(
            Tauola = cms.untracked.PSet(
                TauolaPolar,
                TauolaDefaultInputCards
            ),
            parameterSets = cms.vstring('Tauola')
        ),
        HerwigParameters = cms.PSet(
                herwigUEsettings = cms.vstring(
                       'JMUEO     = 1       ! multiparton interaction model',
                       'PTJIM     = 4.189   ! 2.8x(sqrt(s)/1.8TeV)^0.27 @ 8 TeV',
                       'JMRAD(73) = 1.8     ! inverse proton radius squared',
                       'PRSOF     = 0.0     ! prob. of a soft underlying event',
                       'MAXER     = 1000000 ! max error'

                        'IPROC      = -18000 ! proc should be -ve',
                        'MODPDF(1)  = 10041  ! pdf set 1',
                        'MODPDF(2)  = 10041  ! pdf set 2'
                ),
                parameterSets = cms.vstring('herwigUEsettings',
                                            'herwigMcatnlo')
        )
)

    version = cms.untracked.string('$Revision: 1.2 $'),

    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(True),

            TauolaDefaultInputCards

    UseExternalGenerators = cms.untracked.bool(True),

        pythiaUESettingsBlock,
        processParameters = cms.vstring('MSEL=0         ! User defined processes',

configuration_files.title: cmsDriver script

configuration_files.script:
import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
	version    = cms.untracked.string('$Revision: 1.1 $'),
	name       = cms.untracked.string('$Source: /local/reps/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_8TeV_aMCatNLO_Herwig_cff.py,v $'),
	annotation = cms.untracked.string('Showering of generic aMCatNLO events with Herwig, 8 TeV, NNPDF21')
)

generator = cms.EDFilter("Herwig6HadronizerFilter",
        comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
        crossSection = cms.untracked.double(0.1835),
        doMPInteraction = cms.bool(False),
        emulatePythiaStatusCodes = cms.untracked.bool(True),
        filterEfficiency = cms.untracked.double(1.0),
        herwigHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(False),
        herwigVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(0),
        lhapdfSetPath = cms.untracked.string(''),
        maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
        printCards = cms.untracked.bool(False),
        useJimmy = cms.bool(False),
        doMatching = cms.untracked.bool(False),
        nMatch = cms.untracked.int32(0),
        inclusiveMatching = cms.untracked.bool(True),
        matchingScale = cms.untracked.double(0.0), 
        ExternalDecays = cms.PSet(
            Photos = cms.untracked.PSet(),
            parameterSets = cms.vstring( "Photos" )
        ),
        HerwigParameters = cms.PSet(
                herwigUEsettings = cms.vstring(
                       'JMUEO     = 1       ! multiparton interaction model',
                       'PTJIM     = 4.189   ! 2.8x(sqrt(s)/1.8TeV)^0.27 @ 8 TeV',
                       'JMRAD(73) = 1.8     ! inverse proton radius squared',
                       'PRSOF     = 0.0     ! prob. of a soft underlying event',
                       'MAXER     = 1000000 ! max error'
                ),
                herwigMcatnlo = cms.vstring(
                        'PTMIN      = 0.5    ! minimum pt in hadronic jet',
                        'IPROC      = -18000  ! proc should be -ve'
                ),
                parameterSets = cms.vstring('herwigUEsettings',
                                            'herwigMcatnlo')
        )
)

configuration_files.script:
import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *
from GeneratorInterface.ExternalDecays.TauolaSettings_cff import *

generator = cms.EDFilter("Pythia6HadronizerFilter",
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    ExternalDecays = cms.PSet(
        Tauola = cms.untracked.PSet(
            TauolaPolar,
            TauolaDefaultInputCards
        ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('Tauola')
    ),
    UseExternalGenerators = cms.untracked.bool(True),   
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock,
        processParameters = cms.vstring('MSEL=0          ! User defined processes',
                                        'PMAS(5,1)=4.8   ! b quark mass',
                                        'PMAS(6,1)=172.5 ! t quark mass',
                                        'MSTP(86)=1      ! requires MPIs to be softer than the main interaction',
                                        ),
        # This is a vector of ParameterSet names to be read, in this order
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('pythiaUESettings',
                                    'processParameters'
                                    )
        )
)

configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
    version = cms.untracked.string('$Revision: 1.2 $'),
    name = cms.untracked.string ('$Source: /local/reps/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/EightTeV/Hadronizer_TuneZ2star_8TeV_generic_LHE_pythia_tauola_cff.py,v $'),
    annotation = cms.untracked.string('runs Z2* Pythia6')
)

import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *
from GeneratorInterface.ExternalDecays.TauolaSettings_cff import *

generator = cms.EDFilter("Pythia6HadronizerFilter",
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(0),
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    ExternalDecays = cms.PSet(
        Tauola = cms.untracked.PSet(
            TauolaPolar,
            TauolaDefaultInputCards
        ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('Tauola')
    ),
    UseExternalGenerators = cms.untracked.bool(True),
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock,
        processParameters = cms.vstring('MSEL=0         ! User defined processes', 
                        'PMAS(5,1)=4.8   ! b quark mass',
                        'PMAS(6,1)=172.5 ! t quark mass',
			'MSTJ(1)=1       ! Fragmentation/hadronization on or off',
			'MSTP(61)=1      ! Parton showering on or off'),
        # This is a vector of ParameterSet names to be read, in this order
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('pythiaUESettings', 
            'processParameters')
    ),
    jetMatching = cms.untracked.PSet(
       scheme = cms.string("Madgraph"),
       mode = cms.string("auto"),	# soup, or "inclusive" / "exclusive"
       MEMAIN_nqmatch = cms.int32(5),
       MEMAIN_etaclmax = cms.double(-1),
       MEMAIN_qcut = cms.double(-1),
       MEMAIN_minjets = cms.int32(-1),
       MEMAIN_maxjets = cms.int32(-1),
       MEMAIN_showerkt = cms.double(0),   
       MEMAIN_excres = cms.string(""),
       outTree_flag = cms.int32(0)    
    )    
)

import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

from Configuration.Generator.PythiaUEZ2starSettings_cfi import *
from GeneratorInterface.ExternalDecays.TauolaSettings_cff import *
generator = cms.EDFilter("Pythia6GeneratorFilter",
    pythiaPylistVerbosity = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    # put here the efficiency of your filter (1. if no filter)
    filterEfficiency = cms.untracked.double(1.0),
    pythiaHepMCVerbosity = cms.untracked.bool(False),
    # put here the cross section of your process (in pb)
    crossSection = cms.untracked.double(1.0),
    maxEventsToPrint = cms.untracked.int32(1),
    comEnergy = cms.double(8000.0),
    ExternalDecays = cms.PSet(
        Tauola = cms.untracked.PSet(
            TauolaPolar,
            TauolaDefaultInputCards
        ),
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('Tauola')
    ),
    PythiaParameters = cms.PSet(
        pythiaUESettingsBlock,
        processParameters = cms.vstring('PMAS(25,1)=125.0        !mass of Higgs', 
            'MSEL=0                  ! user selection for process', 
            'MSUB(102)=0             !ggH', 
            'MSUB(123)=0             !ZZ fusion to H', 
            'MSUB(124)=0             !WW fusion to H', 
            'MSUB(24)=0              !ZH production', 
            'MSUB(26)=0              !WH production', 
            'MSUB(121)=1             !gg to ttH', 
            'MSUB(122)=1             !qq to ttH', 
            'MDME(210,1)=0           !Higgs decay into dd', 
            'MDME(211,1)=0           !Higgs decay into uu', 
            'MDME(212,1)=0           !Higgs decay into ss', 
            'MDME(213,1)=0           !Higgs decay into cc', 
            'MDME(214,1)=0           !Higgs decay into bb', 
            'MDME(215,1)=0           !Higgs decay into tt', 
            'MDME(216,1)=0           !Higgs decay into', 
            'MDME(217,1)=0           !Higgs decay into Higgs decay', 
            'MDME(218,1)=0           !Higgs decay into e nu e', 
            'MDME(219,1)=0           !Higgs decay into mu nu mu', 
            'MDME(220,1)=0           !Higgs decay into tau nu tau', 
            'MDME(221,1)=0           !Higgs decay into Higgs decay', 
            'MDME(222,1)=0           !Higgs decay into g g', 
            'MDME(223,1)=1           !Higgs decay into gam gam', 
            'MDME(224,1)=0           !Higgs decay into gam Z', 
            'MDME(225,1)=0           !Higgs decay into Z Z', 
            'MDME(226,1)=0           !Higgs decay into W W'),
        # This is a vector of ParameterSet names to be read, in this order
        parameterSets = cms.vstring('pythiaUESettings', 
            'processParameters')
    )
)

configurationMetadata = cms.untracked.PSet(
    version = cms.untracked.string('$Revision: 1.1 $'),
    name = cms.untracked.string('$Source: /cvs_server/repositories/CMSSW/CMSSW/Configuration/GenProduction/python/Attic/TTH_HToGG_M_125_TuneZ2star_8TeV_pythia6_cff.py,v $'),

)
